content.detailedDescription:
I was out in my backyard admiring a beautiful incredibly clear blue sky and that the jet going overhead was only leaving a 'real' vapor trail as opposed to the chemtrail spew when i saw that there was a bright white pinpoint spot of something at a much higher altitude than the jet as the jet and trail obscured the object before i noticed it. 
the fact that it was a small pinhead point of white in the bright blue of the sky and absolutely stationary made it odd. i spotted it between power lines so i had a reference point to track movement if it moved in a direction and the space between the object and the lines changed. it didn't. and the pinpoint of white did not appear to be rising either like say, a helium balloon might. it didn't waver in any way from its position.No birdlike attributes or flapping or soaring, no wings like a plane and it certainly wasn't flying anywhere. even a satellite would be moving in it's orbit but you can't see those in the daytime sky.   
i had company staying with me so i called them outside as well and they observed the same object and behaviour. 
i watched for several minutes, went to find a camera but battery was dead, used the bathroom and when i got back out it had vanished. 
there was nothing else in the airspace during the time we observed it except the jet that originally flew overhead. no clouds, no other aircraft. i live under an approach flight path for small fixed wing aircraft to a large metropolitan airport and can view the main approach for the heavy traffic in as well from the front porch. i see all kinds of aircraft from vintage to stealth, all day, everyday. 
this object was at very high altitude as the commercial jet was quite high as well, probably at 29-35k feet on a long range flight at cruising altitude. 
i didn't see it arrive at it's position and i didn't see it 'leave' but 3 of us saw it sitting up there for a good 15 minutes or so, unmoved in it's position. 
i can't say that i or we 'felt' anything but curiosity. i'm not claiming it to be an alien anything, but it wasn't a plane, bird or balloon.
thank you for your time to read this.
content.summary: Stationary pinpoint of bright white at high altitude during the day.

content.detailedDescription: I live in farm country on a road not used a lot. was on my was to the store in town. was an almost cloudless morning with bright sun. as i left my driveway heading west about half way between my home and 8th road approx. 5/8 of a mile i noticed a circular shadow on the ground, stretching across 3rd road ( my road i live on ) and also into each field on the north and south side of the road. best guess the circular shadow was about 150 to 200 feet across. i did not notice any thing in the air. as i drove threw the shadow at about 45 mph, my engine stalled, i coasted thru the shadow and brought my car to a stop. noticed all gauges were inoperable, got out of my car, shadow still present, looked up and around saw nothing but almost clear sky. tried to restart my car with no success, wouldn't even crank. figured a bad battery connection, looked all was okay. as i looked back at the shadow, it just seemed to up and disappear. got back into my car and it now started right back up. have had a weird feeling in my person ever since that moment. a queezy type feeling, shaking some as well. the shadow lasted about 8 minutes on the same spot, if it were clouds they would have moved during that time. figure i'd tell someone, it's evening and still feeling queezy, after this. ufo? something else?
content.summary: Don't know what if any it was!

content.detailedDescription:
I went out on my back deck at 4am and as always looked up at the sky.
the morning was clear and the constellations were easily visible especially
orion and canis major.  coming out of the south and moving directly north was what seemed to be a high flying plane.  i figured it was probably a ups or fed ex plane, but it didn't have its traditional red and green nav lights.  the craft had two white lights, one behind the other and neither blinked.  i didn't think much about it until a beam of light turned on and flashed sideways a couple times for about four seconds then turned off.
i thought to myself, what plane at that altitude would use a searchlight?
there was no sound, and if it was a helicopter looking for something it would have been much lower and more obvious to me at what it was. the object continued to move across the sky to the north and disappeared behind the trees.
content.summary: Object with two white lights flying slowly, then turned on a beam of light as if searching.

content.detailedDescription: We were cruising along androstic rd. towards uschak rd. seeing blinkies we made a right to the top of the hill on uschak and pulled into a driveway across from fairview lane. we saw two orange balls rise from the woods in between us and the elks golf course. they came out one at a time, hovering and then quickly moving then stopping along the ridge line in the direction of route 22, finally disappearing below the hill on the 981 side. at the same time hovering red craft with reddish colored lighting were just to the right of the driveway hovering about 200 feet apart from each other. we moved when a faker (mimicking conventional craft) came right over us fairly low, no sound. feeling nervous we traveled in the direction of pandora rd on uschak rd. and stopped at the fields by the old railroad bed and power lines. two erratically blinking orange balls were in the woods at roughly ground level between us and stewart road. at the same time, 2 hovering fakers surrounded by blinkies were along the power lines in the same direction. this is the same kind of phenomenon a lady in murrysville, pa is seeing and has documented numerous hours of on video. we will try and get photos and video of this stuff on our next outing.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Blinkies in the sky. amber orbs in the woods and hovering above trees. fakers hovering above fields and powerlines

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home in littleton around 8:00pm on 4/1/11 and saw two *very* bright lights in the sky.  initially we thought they were two helicopters with spot lights that were only 10-20 or so blocks away.  the lights were about as bright as you would expect if the spot light was pointed toward you from this distance.  as we started moving again, we realized the objects were much further away--what looked to be over golden/lakewood, but high in the sky.  at this point, we both realized we were seeing something very unusual.   both lights appeared to be completely still.  the lights rotated through different colors subtly, but were mainly white.  we decided to keep driving to see if we could make them out better.  a third light appeared.  then a fourth.  they seemed miles apart from each other, forming a perfect square/diamond formation.  they were separate because you could see empty sky/clouds between them.  they all remained completely still.  this all happened over a couple of minutes, then the lights all moved north and beyond the horizon, out of site.  other drivers were looking and pointing at them from their cars.  the most striking part was the quality of the lights, which were all incredibly bright--very different than standard airplane/helicopter lights.  there were no particular sounds associated with these objects.  there were also no other lights in that area of the sky at the time, which might be indicative of an aircraft practicing flare drops.
content.summary: Four distinct very bright lights in the sky along the front range of colorado on 4/1/11 at 8pm

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were driving down lake avenue from southington, ct heading towards bristol ct around 1:30 am the morning of march 30th, 2011. i was sitting in the passenger seat and my boyfriend was driving when he noticed a very peculiar star in the sky, as i identified it as being the brightest thing in the sky you could tell it wasn't a solid color, but was red and white and moved around in the sky differently from anything else, he thought it was a planet at first but the object quickly appeared to be very large because it came towards us at amazing speed as we continued down the road and he began to slow the car down.
    the object did not make a sound, and was defiantly not a plane or a helicopter or anything else that could of been explained away, the shape seemed fluid as it got closer, the white lights seemed to be pointy and protruded from the center of the object kinda like spikes , my boyfriend has better eyes than i do and as it hovered just above the treetops he could see definition of the object and described it as saucer-like with windows in the center, from what we both could see the center of the object was bright red, and was surrounded by 6 very bright but smaller white lights, 4 of them on the sides and one on both the top and bottom, the object was about as wide as the 2 lane street we were on, and about twice as tall. as soon as i realized that the object was not a man made helicopter or of earthly origin i became very frightened and had my boyfriend turn the car around and flee in the other direction. the saucer was so large and bright that it lit up the tops of the trees, and it also had what seemed like a beam of light that  came down to the ground as it approached us, it was only a few hundred feet away. it seemed aware that we were watching it and also it seemed as if it was curious about us as well, my boyfriend was mesmerized by it and would of continued to approach it had i not become stricken with fear and demanded we get as far away from that saucer as possible, i have never been so afraid of something before in my life. as we drove away the object was still very bright and visible in our rear-view mirrors, this thing defiantly was not a man-made object.   
    my boyfriend and i have had ufo sightings in the past, 2 times last year in the same neighborhood in which we had the most recent encounter. the 2 previous sightings were last year of 2010, in the spring and summer, both sightings occurring during the day. on one occasion we saw 4 strange single-white-light flying objects that seemed to dance in and out of the clouds then come close down to earth, and dart around some more. this went on for several minutes and then the objects disappeared. 
     during the other sighting, we saw a single bright white light hovering right on the top of the mountain, as our home was at the bottom of the mountain, we had a pretty clear view to the top, we saw the light hang in the air for almost an hour, it had the same kind of white color that the object with 6 lights and one red one in the center had, it stayed at the top of the mountain and kind of hovered higher then lower and higher again, and eventually it settled down into the treetops. the other sightings have not bothered me or shocked me the way the most recent sighting has. there was no question of what i saw approach us a few days ago, it was terrifying and very real.  i really wish i had my camera that night, just so people would believe me, but i know what my boyfriend and i saw was not human. whats really going on out there? ? i would like to know if anyone has had any similar sightings in the area
content.summary: 6 bright white lights surrounded by one large red light

content.detailedDescription:
Saw three lights in sky with wife and grandson. the video at  *(link moved to additional evidence section -- cms/sg) is the same view we had, which leads me to think about what we saw as well. our photo was hasty and poor, as the camera couldn't photograph the sky and the lights at wide angle. the closeup was blurred.
our view, compared to the video, was much closer and wider (if they were a single object), with about 45 degrees azimuth. the right light was almost to the south, perhaps  south-southeast as seen in relation to the  planet (i believe jupiter) in the photo.  the leftmost light was more to the south east, seeming directly east of the right from my view. the apex of the isoceles triangle it made was about 45 deg or so in elevation and between the two, but higher inclination. we saw the lights through the leaf bare trees mostly. 

these lights never moved, either in relation to each other, nor in relation to the tree branches we were looking through. they looked liked planes in sky, but never moving and without noise. it was too large across the sky for a blimp, and again, no propeller noise. helicopters in wide formation didn't make sense either, and why would the lights fade out? we looked for solid material between the lights and could see none. the stars were not bright enough to pass through the sky, which was a couple hours past sunset. the sky seemed clear, but must have been a bit hazy as i don't recall stars that night, although jupiter was bright.

the lights faded out almost simultaneously after about 10 or 15 minutes. i tend to think they were synchronous satellites in the sky reflecting sunlight of the sun that set to my view a few hours ago, and blinking out as the west setting sun passed the horizon of the satellites.   given the time posted, my location on my patio on the west bank of the fox river in batavia, and the relative location of the undetermined planet, i bet that theory could be confirmed or not.
content.summary: Three lights over batavia

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 10:10pm as my husband and i were watching television, he looked out of our balcony door (to the outside) and said, "what's that light?!" i didn't respond immediately, but his reaction was strong enough to get me off the couch to check it out. when i looked i saw nothing. he said, "what?! it's gone? that's crazy." he didn't believe me so he got up and we both went outside onto our balcony for a better look (we live on the second floor, on the back or eastern facing side of the building). there was some scant cloud cover, but through breaks in the cloud, i saw what appeared to be a red, twinkling light, ascending very quickly. it wasn't moving straight up, but it was an incredibly severe ascension. we also noted two other similar reddish twinkling (not really flashing) lights moving just as quickly in other directions. one of them travelled due south, and unfortunately we couldn't track the other as well - i'm afraid i don't know what became of it. our primary focus was the ascending light because it was the most baffling in behavior. there was also an airplane in our line of vision which appeared normal. in comparison to the lights we saw it seemed as though it were flying at a snail's pace. we have a limited sky view from our balcony so it wasn't long before we couldn't see anything anymore except the plane.
when we came back inside (and as i immediately got on the computer) i asked my husband what he initially saw. he described a very bright, intense white light that appeared to be moving our direction (east to west). he assumed it was the headlights of an aircraft though the light was unusually bright for an aircraft that was likely to be quite a distance away. i think this is why he was so surprised mere seconds later when i looked and didn't see anything. 
the whole "event" lasted maybe only 30 seconds - definitely not longer than a minute. after we came inside, i looked at the clock on our computer which read 10:12pm. we were both completely baffled by what we saw and had different ways of dealing with it. he kind of didn't think it was a big deal, but conceded that it was very strange. i, on the other hand, remembered the reports from lafayette last week and was looking online to see if anyone else saw what we saw or if norad, or somebody, was performing scheduled exercises. i also posted something on facebook, which people thought was an april fool's prank. i didn't know what to do, where to report it, if i should report it, or how to explain what we saw. i kind of assumed that other people would have seen the same thing given the population of this area. my guess is that these lights were quite far from our location which leads me to think people in other communities certainly could have witnessed these fast flying lights.
unfortunately we have no photos or video; it happened so quickly and neither of us wanted to step away. 
i really hope this is helpful to somebody and i also hope i haven't made anything more difficult by not reporting it immediately.
content.summary: Witnessed three

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were coming back from the mall. it was around dusk, not dark but getting there. we saw this triangle shape air craft just hovering over the express way.  you couldn't help but notice it. it wasn't making any noise, just hanging there like someone painted it in the sky. i couldn't really study it because i was driving but my son could. i got off the express way so i could get a better look but when i turned around, which took aprox. 10 seconds it was gone. i listened to the news, read the paper,but it wasn't talked about anywhere.  i know people had to have seen it, because it wasn't even dark but it wasn't mentioned.
content.summary: Saw it hovering over express way

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on north littlefield rd to a friends house when i saw what i thought was a helicopter going across the sky to the west, it then went behind some really thick tall area of woods and i could no longer see it i lost vision of it @ river road. then as i continued to drive north still i started to approach basline i started to see rhis object again plain as day it was probaly 1mile off the ground as it was coming back over the trees towards me then it turned horizontally over an open field and i noticed it wasnt a helicopter it was a triangle so i listened and could hear no sound! as im watching this thing out my drivers window it kept right even with me for about a half mile i was going approx 45mph then i started to get scared so i hit my brakes n the object started to move quite fast so i hurried about another 300yds down the road to my friends pulled in parked my van and got out, at this time it had just passed above their apt so as you can imagine im a lil shook up so then i get back into the van and  once again lose sight of the object! so i start to head back south from 835 n littlefield  rd and go about 300 yds back to the empty field and once again here was that same triangular shape coming over top of the trees! i then turned right down  baseline to attempt to find it to get a better look but without success it dissapeared!
content.summary: Triangle with one red light on the left and one green light on the right and a bright white light @ the tip!

content.detailedDescription:
I was celebrating new years in a park waiting for the fireworks, when i got the urge to look through the trees directly above me and there i spotted what looked like a glowing squiggly line. it was like an s with an extra curve and stretched out. nobody but me seemed to notice it and then i showed my friend to make sure i wasn't crazy (for lack of a better term) and surely he saw it too. immediately it came into my mind that it was a ufo, even though back then i was still fairly young and i was never really interested in ufos or knew anything about them until the past few years.
 we watched it very slowly crawl across the sky rather mesmerized until it drifted out of view behind the trees. the object had very little movement but seemed to be shining brightly. the sight of it kindled some interest in me and really excited me as i believed i was witnessing something that many people don't see all their lives. it made me wonder if i was supposed to see it for it was rather unusual how i just knew it was directly above me, the sighting did not seem to me to be by chance. even though it was such a short vague encounter, i still believe it was something extraterrestrial/intraterrestrial/ultraterrestrial. i am rather positive this wasn't a satellite, concerning the very odd shape, and it did not seem military to me. however who knows considering the things our governments are hiding from us.
content.summary: Celebrating new years and roughly an hour before new years came i spotted a ufo very high up in a very unusual shape.

content.detailedDescription:
i live in lampasas 70 miles north and a little west of austin tx. at about 1845cst i was in my backyard talking to my wife. i noticed a bird in the east and followed it toward the south. that is when i saw multipe objects and commented to my wife. she saw them also. they seemed to be traveling east to west. my first thought was they were a group of missles/rockets, then aircraft, then in unison they stopped  in the sky roughly east south east(more east than south) of my position. at that point i was 100% sure i was not looking at at known conventional aircraft, ballons,birds or flares... using the horizontal as 9 o'clock the objects were at about 11 o'clock.  estimate height at 30-40000ft. actual height is unknown as i had no refernce for size other than the "vapor trails". distance from my observation point is unknown(maybe 10-20 miles).   the objects moved at multiple angles to initial trajectory. appeared to fade out and reappear, forming geometric shapes. i beliveve the obects were reflcting  light from the setting son. they all stayed in same patch of sky, 2, 3 or 5 would wander south a bit away from main group. then disappear and reapper in main group. as time went on there were less in the sky. 12 down to 10  down to 7,6,5,4,3,2,1. eventually all disappeared. i stayed and watched until all were gone.  the show lasted about 20-25 minutes.

i served 20 years in the us army. trained in security/observation/surveillance. 

please contact me cell phone or primary email listed. i will talk to third parties(selective).
content.summary: Appeared to be 8-12 "dots"

content.detailedDescription: I was driving in to workout at gym at my place of employment; the time was 4:58am and it was a clear morning with a crescent moon in the east.  i turned from torrey pines road onto la jolla village road going east.  at the next intersection, la jolla scenic, there was something hovering over a grove of trees and condos.  it was about 100 to 200 feet in the air, had red and blue lights with a few white ones.  none of the lights was flashing and they appeared in a triangle shape.  instinctively, i rolled my window down and peered at it as i drove past (there were no other cars on the road).  i could not hear anything or feel anything.  once past la jolla scenic i was committed to that direction, so i made a right onto the next available street (villa la jolla) and drove into a parking lot that was east of the lights.  however, i was now down a hill and could just see the lights through the top of the trees.
content.summary: Triangle shaped hovering craft; red, white, blue lights not flashing

content.detailedDescription: My personel computer is down so im using the library computer to send this ive already sent one e-mail but since i dont know if it went through im sending a second e-mail. i was visiting the dam and recreation area in peru, indiana in miami county. on mon.Mar. 28, between the hours of 7:00 and 8:00 am on highway 12 coming into white pigeon, mich. i noticed a very bright illuminated triangular shaped, stationary object, as it was getting light and there were no stars visible at all in the sky and this object was too close to earth to be a star. i observed the object for 5 to 10 minutes and then noticed something streaking across the sky, and what appeared to be a jet traveling at a very high rate of speed as if pursing it, left 2 white plumes behind it. i asked numerous people at gas stations and other places if they noticed it but since i was a stranger they acted like they didnt want to talk about it. my first encounter with a u.F.O. sighting was at fort ord, california, i was pulling guard duty in a isolated part of the base at 2:00 am in the morning, i mentioned it to the sargent who picked me up after guard duty about 4:00am who told me to forget it and dont mention it. i was in the united states army from 1971 to 1973. sincerely *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Visual sighting while driving

content.detailedDescription:
I was spending a very nice summer night on a fairway at belmont country with my girl friend.  the night was as clear as it possibly could be.  we were looking up at the stars and noticed movement.  at first i thought it must be a satellite but the light was much to bright and big.  we then noticed two more of the exact same object/light.  what was really strange was the positioning in the sky, direction of travel and exactness of speed and spacing of the objects.  

it was not like they were close by any means.  one object was coming from the north horizon, one from the south and the other from the west.  if they were in the earths atmosphere, it was not by much.  the distance they had to cover was huge.  as i said before, they were all traveling at the same speed and toward each other.  the north and south object were traveling directly towards each other and the object from the west was headed toward were they were going to intersect.  neither of us had ever seen anything like this before.  it took the objects approximately 5 to 10 minutes to cover half of the distance of the night sky.  as they got close, we thought they were going to collide.  amazingly, the moment they came together, it almost seemed as if they became one and they were gone.

i have told a lot of people about this event over the years.  looking back, i guess i was more of a skeptic than a believer.  not the case any since.  with the new alien/ufo shows on tv, i have been thinking about it more.  that is also why i am reporting it now.  i know we are not alone and if my case can help coo berate another then i have helped.  

thank you,

*(wit's first name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Three star like objects traved toward each other met and shot off

content.detailedDescription: Yesterday and this morning i've awakened fully at 4:00 a.M. which is very unusual for me.  after an hour of useless attempts to get back to sleep, i felt the urge to go outside.  i sat with my head resting on the back of the lawn-chair and noticed an large bright white star that seemed unusual in that it was the size of sirius.  the rest of the stars seemed small pinpoints in comparison.  it was approx. 80 degrees up from the horizon in the southern portion of the sky from where i was sitting. i was aware of it for about 2 minutes as i looked at the rest of the sky. then it started moving in an arched but mostly straight line to the southeast.  there was absolutely no sound and no blinking.  it did look about twice as large as when it was stationary...And brighter.  it's speed didn't vary, nor did it's line of direction.  i watched it for about 15 seconds until it disappeared behind a bank of clouds near the horizon.  i've seen this type of silent, white star sightings often over prince edward island and several times star-like objects which are silent and solidly coloured reddish orange.
content.summary: Stationary, big white star in still, dark morning sky which suddenly moved from south to south east.

content.detailedDescription:
In the following statement i will include two separate ufo sightings.  one of them was sighted by my grandfather,grandmother, and uncle.  the other sighting was sighted by myself.

it was the 09' deer gun season.  my grandfather, grandmother, and uncle were deer hunting in cornell, wi near firth lake and were camping off a road called moses lake road.  approximately 1 am my grandfather spotted what looked to be about 30 lanterns outside hovering above firth lake.  he stepped out of the camper and to his amazment this was a craft...A disk shaped craft hovering over firth lake approximately 20 feet above the lake and the craft was approximately 40-50 feet wide.  my uncle stepped out of the camper and was also amazed at the sighting.  he grabbed a flashlight and flashed it at the ufo.  my grandfather yelled at him to not do that.  my grandmother did see it from inside the camper, however, she didn't go outside.  she pulled the covers over her head and hid.  my grandfather immediately knew what it was as now he states when he was in the air force "they" had a hangar were they kept a "captured" ufo.  he called it nfo for the longest time, but he meant ufo.  approximately 10 minutes when by and the craft as they say shot what seemed to be 100,000 mph into space and didn't even make a sound.

the second sighting was sighted by myself, however, i was bow hunting with my uncle.  approximately late october 2010 at around 4pm.  i was in my tree stand and i could see firth lake through the trees pretty clearly.  all of a sudden a white orb comes out of nowhere and is circling the lake.  it was moving up and down as well.  this lasted for about 5 minutes and then the white orb disappeared into the woods.  i had such a clear sight of it, it was just unreal.  i knew there was no explanation for whatever this was.  i was pretty shook up and i went to my truck early.  my uncle came out and asked me why i was out of the woods already.  i told him, he said "hmmm maybe it was a duck boat?"  this is the same uncle who tells the story of the first ufo incident by the way.  anyways i told him no, absolutely not, i saw this thing very clearly literally going in fast circles around the lake and moving up and down.

i haven't been back to that hunting area since then.  they still hunt there.
content.summary: Firth lake ufo's

content.detailedDescription: Friend and i were driving home from dinner, thought i saw a jet with chem-trails way up, but when i looked closer it was more of like a silver oblong shape standing vertically. then it would change to a small white light, and back again periodically. we saw what appeared to be dark clouds around it, but they seemed to move around the light which seemed to fade from time to time but never completely and then return to full brightness. these could only be seen when it was not vertical. we took a few turns to get a better look and watched this all unfold for probably five minutes until eventually the light could not be seen anymore. we felt perplexed, not scared, but definitely curious. unfortunately, my phone was not able to pick up the object on its camera.
content.summary: Silver oblong object in the sky standing vertically that seemed to change to a light when horizontal and back again.

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were sitting in my fathers car which sat on a hill behind our house.  i had the door open for ventillation when i saw a large very bright glowing green sphere shoot across the sky.  it had no meteor like tail and to give you an idea of how bright it was, it was daylight and it still had a very bright glow.  i remember at the time i compared the size to a full size van so approx 15-20 feet in diameter and it seemed to be no more that 50 feet above the tree line.  i was shocked and scared at first so as soon as it passed over the hillside i ran down to tell my father about it only to find my other brother whom had been sitting in the house was frantically telling my stepmother that he had seen the same thing.  when i asked him what he had witnessed he said he was sitting on the couch in the house and saw the object thru the living room window hovering over town making irradic changes in movement.  when i heard his account of what happend my stomach sank because there is no way he could have seen the same object as i did from inside the house... the obeject i seen went only in a straight line and was not visible from inside the house which means their was either more than one object or we both witnessed the same obeject navigating.  not knowing what this was has bothered me for quite some time, i would really appreciate it if some one could tell me what we saw.  thank you
content.summary: Very bright green glowing sphere, no tail, approx the size of a full size van, flying low and very fast.

content.detailedDescription: Alien marking on my hand . it was some sort of writing or a tracking device . it was painful while it was on my hand thin the pain went away and the weird symbol on my hand went away
content.summary: Alien print on my hand then disappears

content.detailedDescription: Me encontraba haciendo footing en la pista de atletismo cuando puede apreciar en el cielo un objeto del tamao de un microbus de forma ovalada con unos extraos tubos a ambos lados, de un color amarillento oscuro y que no emita rudo alguno. corr hasta la otra parte de la pista donde tena el telfono y mis pertenencias y comenc a grabarlo con el mvil. cuando empec a grabarlo, se haba alejado. su distancia en el primer instante al verlo era de un kilmetro aproximadamente. cuando comenc la filmacin podra estar alrededor de los dos o tres kilmetros y alejndose cada vez ms. cuando termin de grabar y ya se perdi entre las nubes, me fu a casa y met la tarjeta en el lector del ordenador, pas las imgenes y al verlo a cmara lenta, pude comprobar que hay otro aparato de un tamao ms pequeo, que se acerca y se aleja y va de un lado a otro de este objeto a una velocidad increble que en el momento de grabar, no pude verlo a simple vista. la grabacin est realizada con un nokia de 2 megapixel y siento no poder rotar la imagen.
content.summary: Objeto del tamao de un microbus de forma ovalada

content.detailedDescription:
My experience took place in the summer of 1979. i believe it was july but it's possible that it was june or august. my sister and i were driving north on i-75 in burton, michigan. it was probably close to 8:00 pm. it was still light outside and we were looking at the moon in the sky and suddenly we both realized that there was something wrong with it. so i pulled off the expressway onto the shoulder of the road so i could see it without worrying about traffic. after i pulled over, the "half-moon", which had been hanging motionless in a vertical position, tilted to an horizonal position and began to descend towards us. of course, we then realized that it wasn't the moon at all.

it was a huge metallic craft. it wasn't exactly round but it had rounded corners. it's color was a silver/gray. large rectangular windows went around the center of the craft. something rotated on it but i don't recall what it was. my sister said it had a dome. again i don't recall that because my eyes were fixed on those well-lit rectangular windows. the craft was descending slowly towards us. it didn't make any noise at all (we had the windows rolled down). it also had colored lights on the ends of the body. there were at least two colored lights, maybe more. i don't recall the colors but they were normal ones like red, blue, or green. it was coming so close that i expected to see something in those windows. 

about this time, a car pulled off the expressway behind my car. some guy asking if we needed help. as soon as this guy pulled behind us, the craft switched directions and quickly flew to the left. it made a 90 degree turn without turning. it just stopped in mid-air and flew left instead of forward. the kind stranger didn't see it until i pointed to it. but he didn't see it like we did. he saw enough to know it wasn't a plane, helocoper, etc.

i believe that if that guy hadn't pulled over that we would've been abducted. no doubt in our minds that it was coming for us. neither one of us were scared. we were excited.

i believe the reason that it was hanging in the sky in that location (above and to the right of bishop airport)was because bishop airport was having an air show that weekend. some of the pilots of the wwii airplanes were flying around the air field and i believe this ufo was observing them. i did check the time after the craft flew away to make sure we didn't lose any time and it was probably about 10 minutes later. my car didn't stall out at any time. i've never reported this to any authority because we didn't know who to call and calling the cops didn't seem like the right thing to do since there was no crime.
content.summary: Huge craft, up close, hanging in the sky like a half moon

content.detailedDescription: Report received via phone call to mufon oregon state director: witness states he was looking a the moon through a telescope (reflector type approx. 8 inch diameter; brand name "orbiter 2600"; magnification unknown) when he saw a black dot move from the edge of the full moon across the face of the moon.  the dot executed some maneuvers, then disappeared into a crater. witness was unable to identify the specific crater. witness also stated that his son saw a cigar shape cross the moon's face on the subsequent night (sunday march 20, 2011).
content.summary: Dark shape seen against face of full moon

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from denver to boulder on highway 36 when i noticed a white light high in the sky to the left of me.  at first i thought it was a plane but it was moving pretty fast.  after about a minute of watching it, the unidentified flying object was to the right of my window and a second white, circular light appeared fairly close and parallel to the first one.  after 30 seconds that second light disappeared and by that time it was behind me.  this was one of the most interesting things i have ever seen, it was definitely not a plane or a helicopter and i started to think maybe it was some toy a kid was playing with but quickly realized that it was probably too dark for a kid to be playing and the object was moving relatively fast, faster than an airplane in the sky and achieved a great distance while i watched it.  when i lost sight of it i was passing the flat irons crossing mall (on my left) and the object was to the right and behind me.
content.summary: Fast moving bright white light, then a second one appeared for about 30 seconds and then disapeared.

content.detailedDescription: Big glowing red sphere on top of the atlantic ocean 100 yards from jacksonville florida beach following me walking . then it plunged underneath the water , within a second it appeared in a different spot on top of the ocean . then it did a show . its movements was like a ball inside of a pin-ball machine . it would be at one point in the ocean , 1 second later vanish and appear 400 yards from the spot on top of the ocean where i first seen it . it continued these movements as whoever controlling it was playing or having fun . but i was scared because it was the size of a car and an intense bright red (glowing) the entire craft was a huge ball (sphere) of red energy light and i was by myself walking on jacksonville florida beach in the dark . then after it did the strange show , it was stationary about 14 blocks on the beach out from the ocean . out of couriosity i walked off the beach on the first road parralell to the ocean towards it to see "wtf" it was . i was going to go near the object. but as i was walking closer to it i hesitated , having an unpredictable feeling if i walked to close to it what might happen to me . so being scared i walked away not looking back at the red glowing ball object.
content.summary: Bright red ball the size of  a car in the atlantic ocean following me along beach

content.detailedDescription:
I was fueling a locomotive at gavin yard, minot, nd. fueling a locomotive takes about 20-30 min. there is a airport nearby about 4 miles. i saw what look like a plane flying real slow over gavin yard and also flying a little low. there were no blinking lights under the object, just a bright white looked like a landing light for a plane. the height of the object was about one and a half telephone poles high. i was wearing a headlamp on my hard hat and i decided to flash my light at it to signal it just to humor myself. the object changed direction and headed in my direction. the object stopped right above my tanker(semi-tractor) the object made no sound had no wings, no smell that i could remember nor wind. the object was black and cylinder in shape about forty feet in length with a white light pointing down and a little faint red light at the end of it.
i got on my radio to see if anyone else could see it but everyone else was inside the tower, as soon as i got off the radio it moved to the south, i watched it for about two minutes and it went slow maybe about 20mph, i looked at my fuel gauge on the locomotive and then looked back to see it and it was gone! the wind was blowing from the west/south west at 11:15 pm july 3rd, 2010.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo stopped above my tanker when i was fueling a locomotive.

content.detailedDescription: Both my wife and i saw the ufo as we were driving to see my wife's family in chihuahua, mexico.  as we approached marfa, we saw it hovering for over 15 minutes in broad daylight.  we stopped in marfa and took 2 pics.  in one you can see the ufo (once you zoom in) the other you can't tell anything.  once in marfa we turned toward presidio and we couldn't see it anymore because it was now behind us.
content.summary: Cigar-shape ufo in marfa, tx

content.detailedDescription: I work at the casino and was walking across the parking lot towards my car at around 4am.  it was very quiet.  i saw a light in the distance that was heading towards me.  i thought it was a helicopter at first, with it's front spot light on.  but as it got closer, i realized it wasn't making a sound.  soon it was almost directly over my head and i just stopped walking and stared at it.  i saw no shape of the object itself just the lights.  there were 3 orange tinted, triangle shaped lights that were in a triangle formation.  picture two upside down triangles side by side and a third centered below them.  then there were 3 smaller, round, green tinted lights around it.  it honestly looked like the star of david without the lines connecting the lights.  it's hard to say how big it was, but i'm thinking not much bigger than a helicopter or maybe a small plane.  this thing looked like it was on course to fly right over the casino, which i was excited about because we have search lights on the roof, so i thought i'd be able to get a good look at the physical features of the object.  well, as soon as it got close, it changed course and went around the lights, completely avoiding them. once on the other side of the casino it continued its original course northward apparently along the mississippi river.  i could see it for some time as the lights were pretty bright and it wasn't very high... maybe the typical height that a helicopter would fly.  i finally lost sight of it because of the tree tops.
content.summary: Ufo quietly flew over head northbound.  it seemed to be following the course of the mississippi river, but it avoided the search lights coming from the roof of the casino.

content.detailedDescription:
I recently made a post about a massive blue flash.  looks like it could have been a transformer.  seriously i never knew transformers could create light like that...Linking videos to show what it pretty much looked like.

*(two links moved to additional evidence section -- cms/sg).

only thing i don't understand is if it is in fact a transformer do they go out in clear weather?
content.summary: Massive blue flash possibly explained

content.detailedDescription: I was in seat 4d, a window seat, on a flight from salt lake city, utah to redmond, oregon. as we ascended to the skies i took advantage of my window seat and pressed my forehead, snug against the plastic triple pane windows of the small passenger jet. as we climbed the skies and rose above the clouds my hearts begins to race a bit. nothing too weird. i write it off as elevation sickness. we move along, parralell to the clouds and i see a black dot out of the corner of my vision. i focus on the shadowy object and notice it's disc-like. my goodness! am i actually seeing a ufo. i stare at the mass, mouth open like a little kid. i say to myself it's a plane. we just took off, it makes perfect sense. the disc doesn't change it's position. i say to myself, if it's a plane, it should be gone when i open my eyes. i close my eyes for three second and open them again. it is still there. sitting atop the clouds. if my next-seat neighbor hadn't given me the aura of introverted recluse, i would have turned to her for confirmation. after the incident, i felt nauseous the whole flight.
content.summary: Stationary black disc sitting atop fluffy cloud.
